title: PLA to garrison in Sansha City
description: China’s Central Military Commission (CMC) has recently authorized the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) Guangzhou Military Command to form and deploy a military garrison in the newly established city of Sansha.
cleanContent: By Yu Runze, Sina EnglishChina’s Central Military Commission (CMC) has recently authorized the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) Guangzhou Military Command to form and deploy a military garrison in the newly established city of Sansha.The garrison command will be a division-level command under the PLA’s Hainan sub-command, responsible for guard, training paramilitary troops and carrying out other military missions.Related news:																																																																								|  |
